titleStmt.title: The copie of the K. Maiesties letter to the L. Maior of the Citie of London and to the aldermen and commons of the same..
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Halirudhouse the 28. of March. 1603.
Copy at reel 1244:14 incorrectly identified on film as STC 14362.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1244:14) and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reels 1313:12b and 1777:32).
Item at reel 1313:12b with: Englands vvelcome to Iames, by grace of God, king of England ... London : Printed for E.VV. and C.K., 1603.
